document.full_text: a southwest airlines flight on route from sacramento to portland returned to the airport on tuesday after the flight crew heard a loud noise from one of the plane's engines, an airline spokeswoman said.
document.title: loud noise prompts return of southwest airlines flight
lines_and_colors: a southwest airlines flight on route from sacramento to portland returned to the airport on tuesday after the flight crew heard a loud noise from one of the plane's engines, an airline spokeswoman said.
